Text: RE YPO Panel April my pleasure to attend I am looking forward to meeting you I will fly in the evening before and try to catch up with Kevin Garland and Patrick Hickey Perhaps if you are around we could meet for a drink Best regards David David B Aronoff email General Partner phone x Greylock Partners fax One Federal St edial Boston MA Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November AM To Subject YPO Panel April David Many thanks for agreeing to speak at our YPO session on April in Houston The meeting will be held at Enron Broadband Services network equipment staging building which is close to downtown We anticipate attendance of about people Breakfast will begin at am and the program will run from am to am The subject is New Trends in Technology and Venture Capital You will be on a panel discussion with two other venture capitalists I expect the tone will be highly informal but I will schedule a conference call probably in early March to provide more details and specific topics of interest Again David thank you I look forward to seeing you in April Jeff David B Aronoff Emailvcf

Heard the news Jeff I heard the news about your resignation I hope all is well and when you are interestedready I would love to talk with you about your future plans Best regards David David Aronoff Greylock Partners Winter Street Waltham MA fax
